title: Small-cap stock under ₹100: LIC-owned NBFC's foreign currency bonds list at Mauritius-based exchange
description: Small-cap stock under ₹100: Smallcap stock Paisalo Digital announced on Tuesday, March 25, that its foreign currency bonds got listed at the Mauritius-based exchange. The non-banking financial company (NBFC), owned by India's largest state-run insurer, Life Insurance Corporation (LIC) of India, made...
